text: "Ruby Tuesday" is a 1967 song by the British rock band The Rolling Stones. It was released as an A-side to Let's Spend the Night Together. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 2 in Australia and Canada, number 3 in the United Kingdom, number 4 in South Africa, number 6 in Ireland and number 10 in Zimbabwe. ==References== Category:1967 songs Category:1960s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:The Rolling Stones songs Category:Marianne Faithfull songs Category:Scorpions (band) songs Category:Rod Stewart songs Category:Julian Lennon songs Category:Psychedelic soul songs Category:Baroque pop songs
title: Ruby Tuesday
